verses.roman:
cāri-dike nṛtya-gīta kare yata jana
sabe dekhe,-prabhu kare āmāre daraśana

synonyms: cāri-dike—on four sides; nṛtya-gīta—chanting and dancing; kare—does; yata jana—all people; sabe dekhe—everyone sees; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kare—does; āmāre daraśana—looking at me.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu stood in the middle of the dancers, and all the dancers in all directions perceived that Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was looking at them.
